title: Mustard-roast ham with parsnips
ingredients: ['1 boneless, unsmoked ham or gammon joint, about 1.3kg, with its skin on (soaked if necessary)', '1 bay leaf', '12 large parsnips, quartered lengthways', '2 red onions, each cut into', '6 wedges', '3 tbsp vegetable oil', '20 whole cloves', '1 tbsp Dijon mustard', '1 tbsp runny honey', '1 tbsp light soft brown sugar', '3 courgettes, trimmed and thickly sliced', '1 tbsp sesame seeds']
